Sends 90% to seller, 10% to burn address; burns V-NFT; sends release message to source L1."},"getListing(uint256)":{"notice":"Return listing details for a V-NFT."},"listForSale(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"List a V-NFT for sale at the given price in wei (native token)."},"listings(uint256)":{"notice":"Listing by V-NFT token ID."},"receiveTeleporterMessage(bytes32,address,bytes)":{"notice":"Receive lock notification from a source L1; mint V-NFT and create listing."},"releaseSent(uint256)":{"notice":"Pending release: vNftId => released (so we can support retry without double-release)."},"retryRelease(uint256,address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Retry sending the release message for a sold V-NFT if delivery failed. Receives lock notifications, mints V-NFTs, manages listings, executes buys (90% seller / 10% burn), and sends release messages back to 5a5ea039df4a849a5f469d9266ed53a3968c47088a3d15f","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://2c8bcabb75332ad8dafd8fdda4273fa2b38be0a884d73232a4d0680610086e52","dweb:/ipfs/QmTQn8HPMKQh3tm1bZ9mqSpWRmhLuNaZkoZYBPAxnxCTvy"]},"src/teleporter/ITeleporterMessenger.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd7e65113e7558b6e222adaefdd04d896956944446fc497b463709960e48318b7","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://e07d218bc647c95b074449220522a58e6c48dd28836af3cc90627a0258f419d0","dweb:/ipfs/QmVGaXLjaRTa1qjFQUEpV6MBUMkyEo5yNYeCNmgBRpWb7A"]},"src/teleporter/ITeleporterReceiver.sol":{"keccak256":"0x51c66e7bdd0e86b42d2b2a97edcabec5d520ba175dde15be7cb0fd7d8a5ca340","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://c14e58c20404a981fcb1d75d64e6961e845ff985cd56c2f7ba5e4001dc0f9221","dweb:/ipfs/QmeKadx9USvi5K2kqbRNmdEmS8UZeCZBVqgvygmERxeUSd"]}},"version":1}

buy(uint256,address,uint256).details: Relayer fee for the release message: buyer must approve and send feeToken to this contract; we approve Teleporter. If feeAmount is 0, no relayer fee is attached.

params.relayerFeeAmount: Amount of fee tokens for the relayer.
params.relayerFeeToken: ERC20 address for relayer incentive (use address(0) and 0 amount for no fee).
params.vNftId: The V-NFT token ID to buy.

params._teleporterMessenger: Address of the TeleporterMessenger on AvaLoom L1.

params.priceInWei: Price in wei (native token, e.g. AVAX/LOOM).

receiveTeleporterMessage(bytes32,address.details: Only callable by Teleporter. Checks: sender. Effects: mint, create listing. No external token transfer before state updates (CEI).

params.originSenderAddress: The AvaLoomSource contract address on the source chain.

retryRelease(uint256,address,address,uin.details: V-NFT must already be burned and listing marked sold. Re-sends same payload (tokenId, originalContract, buyer). Does not clear listing to avoid double-release; Source contract will reject if already released.

params.buyer: The buyer address (must match the listing at time of buy).
params.vNftId: The V-NFT token ID that was sold.

params.sourceContract: Address of AvaLoomSource on that chain.

BURN_ADDRESS().notice: Burn address for 10% commission (signals support for network economy).

BURN_BPS().notice: 10% of sale price is sent to burn address (Retro9000 / AVAX burn alignment).

RELEASE_MESSAGE_REQUIRED_GAS().notice: Gas limit for delivering the release message on the Source L1.

V_NFT().notice: V-NFT contract (virtual NFTs representing locked originals).

buy(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Buy a listed V-NFT. Sends 90% to seller, 10% to burn address; burns V-NFT; sends release message to source L1.

getListing(uint256).notice: Return listing details for a V-NFT.

listForSale(uint256,uint256).notice: List a V-NFT for sale at the given price in wei (native token).

receiveTeleporterMessage(bytes32,address.notice: Receive lock notification from a source L1; mint V-NFT and create listing.

releaseSent(uint256).notice: Pending release: vNftId => released (so we can support retry without double-release).

retryRelease(uint256,address,address,uin.notice: Retry sending the release message for a sold V-NFT if delivery failed. Only usable once per vNftId (releaseSent already set); callable by anyone to incentivize relayers.

setSourceContract(bytes32,address).notice: Register a source contract for a given source chain (so we know where to send release messages).

sourceContractsByChainId(bytes32).notice: Source L1 blockchain ID => Source contract address (for sending release messages).
